title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I am like a perfectionist kind of person , so ,i think that small casino site, like , sites have less high rollers, low monthly traffic, new sites, not have lot of reviews, small sites, sites with odd names,are not trusted they will not pay the money after winning, or not give withdrawal,can i trust these sites, to make  account and play, and also many small and big sites on these forum which is promoting their sites are trusted.?you know, many people like me waste their lot of time researching which is the best site, which have high rollers, and lot of traffic , like stake. com have but i want to make other account on other sites , my question is can i trust these sites , which is on 2nd or 3rd or 4th on list of best sites , which is written by bloggers, keeping in mind that which have more referral commission is going to be in first places,and also can you suggest some trusted sites please?

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: There are a lot casinos out there. What type of games do you prefer? I have been playing with flush.com and stake for long time without any withdrawal issue or any other issue. Always focus on casinos which have good name in the industry, have been here for long. Though flush.com is here for a year, they are here for business. Their domain name itself talks for them  If you would like to use my referral link, feel free to PM me

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Any bloggers are just copy pasting from other blogs or get paid from the casinos, not to mention they might just randomly list the casinos and use ChatGPT to create long description. I wouldn't trust any bloggers except the two trusted casino blogs in this forum e.g. gamblingbro and Btcgosu. There's always a risk if you want to play in small casino, shit can happen even though you've analyzed and think the site wouldn't scam you.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 05, 2023, 09:04:16 AMcan i trust these sites, to make  account and play, and also many small and big sites on these forum which is promoting their sites are trusted.?If it is not on this forum, I can not trust small site, I prefer going for the big ones that people are recommending others to join, this was common to me before I joined this forum, I only go for the best because I know the small or non well known casinos can displease customers or go away with customers money. But when I joined this forum, I can see some new casinos which started good and expecting to grow, many are trustworthy as long as they are active on this forum.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on March 05, 2023, 09:22:20 AMI wouldn't trust any bloggers except the two trusted casino blogs in this forum e.g. gamblingbro and Btcgosu. thanks, for sharing these blogs i really feeling lucky , and i would suggest these blogs to members who don't know It helps a lot for gambling knowledge and giving a insider view of gambling sites

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I mostly look into casino sites registered here because I believe they too would have some good reputation aside being registered here. This platform is a platform that accommodates all but genuine and sincere organizations which are reliable and trustworthy. Some few casinos as mentioned my members here are ok to deal with as they have been in existence for quite a long time now and running successfully without any complaints with a good customer care service which is the key focus to a lasting project and they are running signature campaign managed by high ranked members with large followership. Nevertheless, there are some few review sites where you can also ratings for casinos, it would also guide you too making your decision on casino to deal with.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: a lot of casino review sites are on this forum and you can find the best casino from their site and both have been mentioned @Jawhead999 , but you can also actually see the casino signature campaigns you usually see on these forums usually casinos that pay a lot of campaign participants of course a big casino and has a lot of money so you don't need to worry about that casino site because of course it can be a recommendation for you too, but it's all up to you, you should do your own research for your own losses, there's no harm in trying to research it. my advice avoid the small casinos

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 05, 2023, 09:04:16 AMand also can you suggest some trusted sites please?you can try Duelbits, they have been operating and is active in this forum for a while now and overall I'd say that they are quite trusted here in the forum(at least in my opinion). the casino might have some scam accusations, but from what I have seen, they do resolve the issue. anyway, if you are looking for more casinos, as Jawhead999 has mentioned gamblingbro and Btcgosu is a pretty good crypto casino review website, you can check them to find a casino that you'd like.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Of course you can trust them. Scammer operations have many red trust ratings on their accounts. One example is 1xbit. See their account and all the negative trust ratings:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2835882See that? There are more than 20 negative trust ratings and an active flag on that account.This casino for example is definitely a scammer. Never ever trust this one.

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on March 05, 2023, 09:22:20 AMThere's always a risk if you want to play in small casino, shit can happen even though you've analyzed and think the site wouldn't scam you.There is even a big risk if you choose to play in a small casino.After all, small casinos are casinos that many gamblers are definitely not interested in.The thing that is most feared by playing in a small casino is when gamblers get a large number of wins and they don't pay for the win because the amount of funds stored in the bankroll is insufficient so they choose to leave without paying anything.This risk is rarely encountered, but as gamblers we must always be careful.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 05, 2023, 09:04:16 AMmy question is can i trust these sites , which is on 2nd or 3rd or 4th on list of best sites , which is written by bloggers, keeping in mind that which have more referral commission is going to be in first places,and also can you suggest some trusted sites please?You can as long as these bloggers have a good reputation in the gambling community, online casino reviewers have a lot to stake because reviewers have everything to lose if they support scams and low-rated casinos they will lose subscribers and visitors and might even be reported, so pick your reviewers to check how they review an online casino, and if their reviews are correct based on player's experience, so far only three reviewers passed my criteria and they are active here so we can question and ask about their reviews.

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 05, 2023, 09:04:16 AMcan i trust these sites, to make  account and play, and also many small and big sites on these forum which is promoting their sites are trusted.?In cryptocurrency, don't trust, verify.In cryptocurrency-accepted gambling industry, don't trust casinos, let's verify their game. We have a saying "Provably fair" that means users can verify casino games and know that casinos don't cheat users.Casino Review, Odds comparison, Provably Fair Verifiers, BotsYou should not trust review sites too because their review articles likely paid ones and their reviews can be not correct. There are Provably Fair Verifiers to verify casino games too.

comments.author: pixie85
comments.body: Quotemy question is can i trust these sites , which is on 2nd or 3rd or 4th on list of best sites , which is written by bloggers, keeping in mind that which have more referral commission is going to be in first places,IMO you can. If a casino is 2nd or 3rd on the list it can't be a scam. Even a casino that  is ranked 10 on the list is still good because it's above average since there's more than 50 crypto online casinos.Try some of the casinos that advertise here on the forum. Most of them have decent traffic if that's what you really want. I don't get why you'd depend your trust on traffic, but do as you like.The number of high rollers or big wins that casinos like to use for advertising doesn't make it better and won't mean that you'll win there. For instance Stake has a lot of traffic but it also has a lot of people posting bad stuff about it. What I'm trying to say here is not that Stake is bad, but that a lot of people means a lot of sins and a lot of issues. Less people can mean less issues, faster response from support, and math stays the same. Your chances of winning in a casino with less high rollers and less traffic is the same.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 05, 2023, 09:04:16 AMmy question is can i trust these sites , which is on 2nd or 3rd or 4th on list of best sites , which is written by bloggers, keeping in mind that which have more referral commission is going to be in first places,and also can you suggest some trusted sites please?What site are we talking about here? and if you mind sharing the review site you visited so we can check if they listed a good site there or not at all. Stake is already a good site and if you are looking for a sports betting site since, you did look at stake so I assume you are into sports betting. You can try sportsbet, roobet or even with BK8, these are one of the best site up to date and you can see high rollers on these sites which you can review if this can work with you or you still want to try other site.

comments.author: MArsland
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 05, 2023, 09:04:16 AMmy question is can i trust these sites , which is on 2nd or 3rd or 4th on list of best sites , which is written by bloggers, keeping in mind that which have more referral commission is going to be in first places,and also can you suggest some trusted sites please?Why risk your money with a casino site that has such criteria? I don't really pay attention to how bloggers make reviews other than their goal only to attract you to become part of their referrals. Regardless of the way they give casino reviews, I always refer to a casino in this forum if it is a crypto casino.My advice is not to rely too much on casino review articles. By having a forum in the gambling threads section you can easily find them here and the reviews are pretty honest based on the facts after they play.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 05, 2023, 09:04:16 AMmy question is can i trust these sites , which is on 2nd or 3rd or 4th on list of best sites , which is written by bloggers, keeping in mind that which have more referral commission is going to be in first places,If you look at the casino site ratings on the blog, you have to be careful with that. because such ratings can be made by scammers from casinos.You are in this forum, now you can explore some of the reputable casinos in the forum. You can learn in advance what the requirements are for each casino. especially regarding KYC.of course, you have to sort it according to the game you play and you like.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: If you are perfectionists then you should know that small casino usually has a high risk of being a scam and you should play only on top tier casino like Duelbits to guarantee safety. You should rely on the quality of service and years of casino operations to determine what’s the best casino for you.You can use btcgosu and gamblingbro casino review site to check all trusted casino available here in the forum.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: in this forum there are lots of big and popular gambling sites for a long time and already have a good reputation here.if there is a big and popular gambling site with a good reputation, why should you choose a gambling site that you can't necessarily trust and have never gotten any reputation.for a gambling site I would suggest Stake.com and for a gambling review site the best for me is BTCGOSU.in BTCGOSU you will find a big and reputable casino in this forum which has been added in BTCGOSU.or you can also look at and read here the many gambling ANN threads which have many original reviews from members of this forum.and I suggest to be careful betting on foreign gambling sites that don't have positive reviews from this forum.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 05, 2023, 09:04:16 AM<...>and also can you suggest some trusted sites please?You can look at the thread i#1 RATINGS of BITCOIN SPORTSBOOKS : poster book discussion n which the bookmakers are listed, but they also have online casinos that are rated, but in any case, you need to additionally conduct research yourself and use it just for information, since many review sites about online casinos may simply have customized reviews.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I would not advise you to trust those bloggers because, with so many bloggers, they only want you to join through the referral link they put in the review article. You are already on this forum and this forum has a lot of reputable casinos so you don't have to look for casinos out there.If you want to find a review site, you can read from the site @efialtis or @gamblingbro. They help people here with their reviews so people know which casino is right for them. Maybe you can play on Stake.com, but there are plenty of other reputable casinos on this forum as well.
